I am running a handful of jobs - each one runs for about 20 hrs a day, te=
rminated and restarted again the next day.
I am noticing that while everyth=
ing runs smooth for a while (a week or so), after that, some of the object =
fetch attempts run into indefinite cycles.
This leads to memory hog, overru=
nning java heap space and ultimately the crawler crashes.

Below is a porti=
on of the log. I still am using H3.0.0

Any directions?
